name: Iggy's Zombie A-Pug-Alypse
description: Iggy is a happy-go-lucky Pug that lives in a mansion with the Duchess Bianca. One day Iggy awakes to find the mansion is overrun with Zombies and Bianca is missing. Can you reunite Iggy and Bianca in this action packed Puzzle-Strategy game?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHZ or higher Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 450 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 450
